required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Possible Predictors of Mortality Based on COVID-19 for Patients Under 50 Years Old: A Multi-Center Experience of Istanbul
clinical_study.official_title: Possible Predictors of Mortality Based on COVID-19 for Patients Under 50 Years Old: A Multi-Center Experience of Istanbul

lead_sponsor.agency: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

clinical_study.source: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: COVID-19, which emerged in China in December 2019, has become a pandemic with its spread to many countries of the world. Mortality rates of COVID-19 pandemics vary between countries. It is known that mortality based on COVID-19 is higher in old population. Therefore the aim of this study to analyze the experience of 7 governmental hospitals in terms of patient characteristics, possible risk factors of mortality based on COVID-19.

detailed_description.textblock: COVID-19, which emerged in China in December 2019, has become a pandemic with its spread to many countries of the world. Mortality rates of COVID-19 pandemics vary between countries. It is known that mortality based on COVID-19 is higher in old population. Although several factors defined to be effective on this 'age depending factors' regional differences should be assessed deeply to clarify both the etiology and epidemiology. Therefore the aim of this study to analyze the experience of 7 governmental hospitals in terms of patient characteristics, possible risk factors of mortality based on COVID-19.

primary_outcome.description: mortality based on COVID-19 within the patients aged between 18-50 will be evaluated

intervention.description: Novel Coronavirus 2019 DNA will be analyzed by PCR in nasopharyngeal swab

study_pop.textblock: Patients who were between 18-50 years of age and were died caused by COVID-19 will be evaluated.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- accepted to participate
- patients who were proven to have COVID-19
Exclusion Criteria:
- declined to participate
- patients whose age under 18 or more than 50 years

facility.name: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital
